messages:
Name: Andraz Sporar
Nationality: Slovenia
Date of Birth: February 27, 1994
Position: Attacker
Current club: Middlesbrough
Championship clubs played for: Middlesbrough
Andraz Sporar is a Middlesbrough attacker who joined the club on June 30, 2022.
The last time that Sporar featured in the league came on May 7, 2022 for Middlesbrough against Preston North End; a match that he played 62 minutes in during a 4-1 defeat.
A home match against Sheffield United on August 14 is the team's next Championship game for Middlesbrough, who have one point and are in 20th position.
Sporar played 35 Championship games last season for Middlesbrough, scored eight goals and provided two assists.

Sporar switched to Middlesbrough on loan in August 2021 from Sporting CP, for whom he has made 29 league appearances in total, scoring nine goals and providing one assist, after joining the club in January 2020 from Slovan Bratislava.
